content:
Keyword Definition Value text_scale Scale of the displayed text (sx,sz) indicatorValue The initial boolean state of the radiobutton 0 or 1 variable The variable whose value will be set by radiobutton. Since we can
not use call by reference for int or string variables in python, I used
a list instead. define a list and pass it value The value to be set to the variable. Since we are using a list, we
can define multiple values. But the length of value list must be same as
length of variable list. a list of values others The list of radio button instances sharing same variable. This must
